metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29948 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Signatures are written to disk before and read during verification, which might be subject to a race condition when a malicious local process or user is replacing the file. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
